p.k: Apple and Onion go on a guided bus tour as part of their plan to get Apple's shoe back. / Apple and Onion have to outwit a mean duck who's taken over their building's roof. / Apple helps Onion achieve his dream of competing on a baking show. / Apple and Onion must find a way to use Burger's trampoline without making him feel used. / Apple and Onion want to become this week's "Most Fun People".
